data.text: @AngryBritain Just got back from a fabulous long weekend in Spain did us the world of good to finally go somewhere after 2.5 years.  Those Covid passes downloaded onto the app come in very handy at both airports.  So u wont need those bits of card lol
@AngryBritain Just arrived in Gran Canaria for a week, so glad we had all our jabs 😎😁
@AngryBritain Thanks, although i have no symptoms at all, apart from a sore throat where I accidentally deep throated the swab, heaved and nearly threw up.
@AngryBritain If Covid isn’t a thing any more, how come both my parents (in their 80s) have just got it for the first time? 🤔
@AngryBritain Don’t need them anyway if you’ve got the NHS app on your phone?

@AngryBritain My MS suffering wife has had 4 …..I repeat FOUR jabs. I’ve had 3. She felt like shit this morning, but had none of the cough, temperature, can’t smell symptoms. Oh yes, for the first time ever we both have tested positive. FFS.
